column5: We have an opening for two fisherman to go to Monster Walleye Lake with us the first week of July. If you are interested reply with your email address and I will get with you. The trip is for one week and it will cost between $800 and $1000. Monster lake is in Manitoba and it is a private Lake with a cabin that will hold 8 of us.
I would love to go with you guys. I have never caught a Walleye over 14" long and I would love to tie into a couple of 18 inchers. I have to check with my wife but if she says I can go ....Im in.
Obviously not the same "Barney" ..of legendary Lac Seul leviathan largess.
